text: We use "cookies" to collect info about you and how you use our site.
Also, if you bump into any errors while using the site, we might automatically collect data about the error and the circumstances surrounding it.

Privacy Policy - The Fun Edition

Sharing Personal Info with Third Parties - The Who's Who
We might share personal info with: A parent, subsidiary, or affiliate of our company
We might share personal info with: An entity that buys, or to which we transfer, all or a big chunk of our assets and business
We might share personal info with: Third parties that collect and process data
We might share personal info with: Third parties, like agents or sub-contractors, who help us give you information, products, services, or direct marketing
We might share personal info with: Our current or potential agents or business partners
We might share personal info with: Our employees, contractors, and/or related entities
